channel.title: Anyone traded anything with blockbuster lately?
channel.description:
ite all,
Just wondering if any of you have sold anything to blockbuster lately. I need some cash fast n was gna take some of my games n dvd's there. I got a membership card thingy (its my mums, with my name on it) but im only 16 so will they like let me trade shit in?
o yeh was thinking of tarding a red steel game, like brand new aswell. whats it worth 2 them>
ty for any help,
MUNkY.

item.title: Anyone traded anything with blockbuster lately?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I wouldn’t bother trading games in, they give you like $5 for a game, or something like $15 if it’s BRAND NEW, just try selling to friends.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone traded anything with blockbuster lately?
